info.name: Ambiance Crunchy themes (orange, blue, grey and green)
info.author: Original Ambiance theme: Kenneth Wimer, James Schriver (Canonical Ltd.)
info.description: Ambiance theme (Mutter theme) + mod by Benoit THIBAUD: customized buttons + Title text centered

metacity_theme.draw_ops: <title version="< 3.1" x="(0 `max` ((width - title_width) / 2)) + 2" y="(0 `max` ((height - title_height) / 2)) + 1" color="C_title_focused_shadow" /> <title version="< 3.1" x="(0 `max` ((width - title_width) / 2)) + 2" y="(0 `max` ((height - title_height) / 2))" color="C_title_focused" />

<title version="< 3.1" x="(0 `max` ((width - title_width) / 2)) + 2" y="(0 `max` ((height - title_height) / 2)) + 1" color="C_title_unfocused_shadow" /> <title version="< 3.1" x="(0 `max` ((width - title_width) / 2)) + 2" y="(0 `max` ((height - title_height) / 2))" color="C_title_unfocused" />
